thread.title: Dallas' Caldwell Cassady & Curry Named to 2015 Elite Trial Lawyers List
thread.title_full: Dallas' Caldwell Cassady & Curry Named to 2015 Elite Trial Lawyers List - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Dallas' Caldwell Cassady & Curry Named to 2015 Elite Trial Lawyers List
text:
Caldwell Cassady & Curry
Trial law firm recognized by National Law Journal for winning largest awards
DALLAS , Oct. 21, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- The Dallas commercial litigation firm Caldwell Cassady & Curry has earned a place on The National Law Journal 's 2015 Elite Trial Lawyers list, which recognizes an exclusive group of law firms that have won the largest awards for their clients.
The attorneys at Caldwell Cassady & Curry are well-known for winning some of the top intellectual property verdicts in U.S. history. Earlier this year, firm principals Brad Caldwell , Jason Cassady and Austin Curry worked with other firm attorneys to help Texas -based Smartflash LLC win a multimillion-dollar patent infringement verdict against technology giant Apple Inc. in the U.S. District Court for the Eastern District of Texas in Tyler . Apple has appealed the jury's liability finding.
In September, the U.S. Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit upheld a $15 million patent infringement verdict won by Mr. Caldwell and co-counsel from Dallas' McKool Smith in favor of Texas -based Summit 6 LLC. The jury trial against consumer electronics powerhouse Samsung Electronics Co. was heard in the U.S. District Court for the Northern District of Texas .
"Clients rely on our ability to win cases, especially when the stakes are high. That's why we are proud to be named to this list based on results we've achieved at trial," says Mr. Caldwell.
The Elite Trial Lawyers list includes 50 firms nationally that won $40 million in client verdicts and settlements from July 2014 through June of this year, as well as firms winning $15 million or more in four separate cases during the same time frame. The full list, which will be announced in November, also will include six additional firms based on their work in specific practice areas.
Dallas -based Caldwell Cassady & Curry represents clients in intellectual property disputes and commercial litigation claims. The firm is home to trial lawyers who have tried and won some of the biggest verdicts of the past decade against some of the largest companies in the world. Visit http://www.caldwellcc.com .
For more information on the recent honors for Caldwell Cassady & Curry, please contact Bruce Vincent at 800-559-4534 or bruce@androvett.com .
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/dallas-caldwell-cassady--curry-named-to-2015-elite-trial-lawyers-list-300163909.html
